entry.title: Joe Biden: Trump's protest comments 'thoroughly irresponsible'

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden: Trump's protest comments 'thoroughly irresponsible'
media:group.media:description:
Vice President Joe Biden, the presumptive nominee of the Democratic Party for the 2020 election, told CNN's Don Lemon he finds President Trump's comments amid the protests "thoroughly irresponsible." "I think he's thoroughly irresponsible. Thoroughly irresponsible. I mean, it is just absolutely — he talks like — I'm afraid I'll say something I'll regret. I just find him thoroughly, totally irresponsible," Biden said. He later added while pushed by Lemon: "This President steps across the line constantly.
#Biden #Trump #CNN

entry.title: Trump keeps lying about this one thing. And its a problem

media:group.media:title: Trump keeps lying about this one thing. And its a problem
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump has repeatedly pushed voter fraud allegations, without evidence, since taking office. CNN's Daniel Dale fact checks the president.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Mayor scolds violent protestors: Not in the spirit of MLK

media:group.media:title: Mayor scolds violent protestors: Not in the spirit of MLK
media:group.media:description:
Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms addresses the protests outside the CNN Center over the death of George Floyd.
Video courtesy WGCL. Visit their YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWElIIlFx2JiyI9UVrbrEcw Or check out their website https://www.cbs46.com/
#Floyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Reporter hit with tear gas: That's a healthy dose

media:group.media:title: Reporter hit with tear gas: That's a healthy dose
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Miguel Marquez reports from Minneapolis where the police are deploying tear gas against demonstrators protesting the death of George Floyd after a curfew was enacted.
#Floyd #CNN #Minneapolis

entry.title: CNN reporter in Minneapolis: I've never seen anything like this

media:group.media:title: CNN reporter in Minneapolis: I've never seen anything like this
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Sara Sidner reports on the ongoing protest over the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis, despite the curfew order.
#Floyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Ex-police officer Derek Chauvin charged with third-degree murder

media:group.media:title: Ex-police officer Derek Chauvin charged with third-degree murder
media:group.media:description:
Former Minneapolis Police Officer Derek Chauvin was arrested and charged with third-degree murder and second-degree manslaughter in the death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Violent George Floyd protests at CNN Center unfold live on TV

media:group.media:title: Violent George Floyd protests at CNN Center unfold live on TV
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Nick Valencia reports live from inside the CNN Center in Atlanta where demonstrations over the killing of George Floyd have turned violent.
#Floyd #CNN #News

entry.title: See how state coronavirus trends evolved in May

media:group.media:title: See how state coronavirus trends evolved in May
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King reviews state coronavirus trends over the month of May after the US reached the grim milestone of 100,000 deaths. #CNN #News

entry.title: CNN reporter Omar Jimenez released from police custody

media:group.media:title: CNN reporter Omar Jimenez released from police custody
media:group.media:description: CNN's Omar Jimenez is released from police custody after being arrested while covering protests over the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis. Minnesota State Patrol arrested the team live on CNN air. #CNN #News

entry.title: Police arrest CNN correspondent Omar Jimenez and crew on live television

media:group.media:title: Police arrest CNN correspondent Omar Jimenez and crew on live television
media:group.media:description: CNN's Omar Jimenez was taken into police custody during a live broadcast at the site of the protests in Minneapolis, after clearly identifying himself to officers. Jimenez's crew were also placed in handcuffs. #CNN #News

entry.title: Twitter labels Trump tweet, says it violates platform's rules

media:group.media:title: Twitter labels Trump tweet, says it violates platform's rules
media:group.media:description:
Twitter placed a public interest notice on a tweet from President Donald Trump, saying it "violated the Twitter Rules about glorifying violence." CNN's Hadas Gold reports.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump tweets on protests: 'When the looting starts, the shooting starts'

media:group.media:title: Trump tweets on protests: 'When the looting starts, the shooting starts'
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brian Stelter reacts to President Donald Trump's tweets about the ongoing protests in Minneapolis over George Floyd's death. #CNN #News

entry.title: CNN reporter says 'zero' police presence as Minneapolis precinct burns

media:group.media:title: CNN reporter says 'zero' police presence as Minneapolis precinct burns
media:group.media:description: CNN's Sara Sidner and Josh Campbell report on the scene as protests erupt in Minneapolis over George Floyd's death while in police custody. The Minneapolis Police Department evacuated the 3rd Precinct of its staff, "in the interest of the safety of our personnel," according to a statement from John Elder, Director of the department's Office of Public Information. "Protesters forcibly entered the building and have ignited several fires." #CNN #News

entry.title: If you're going to go out to eat, listen to these tips

media:group.media:title: If you're going to go out to eat, listen to these tips
media:group.media:description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta has some coronavirus safety tips for those who choose to start eating out at restaurants again. #CNN #News

entry.title: ‘Is this a joke?’ See Don Lemon’s reaction to FBI’s request

media:group.media:title: ‘Is this a joke?’ See Don Lemon’s reaction to FBI’s request
media:group.media:description: CNN's Don Lemon reacts to the FBI's call for more information regarding the death of George Floyd, an African American man who was killed after a Minneapolis police officer used his knee on Floyd's neck to pin him -- unarmed and handcuffed -- to the ground. #CNN #News
